sentences.en: Current employment laws will be changed to reward effort and punish laziness.
sentences.cn: 现行雇佣法要变，要奖勤罚懒。
他的酬劳是应得的,你别妒忌.

sentences.en: He deserves a reward for his efforts.
He received a medal in reward for his bravery.
sentences.cn: 他因勇敢获得一枚奖章.

sentences.en: He will expect some reward after working so hard.
sentences.cn: 他工作很努力,会得到报偿的.

sentences.en: How can I reward your kindness?
sentences.cn: 我怎样才能报答你的好心 呢 ?

sentences.en: I didn't do it for reward; I did it for love.
sentences.cn: 我做这件事不是为了报酬, 而是 出于爱好.

sentences.en: I don't expect anything in reward.
sentences.cn: 我不指望得到任何酬报.

sentences.en: Is that how you reward me for my help?
sentences.cn: 那就是你报答我给予帮助的方式 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is within our power to reward him for that.
sentences.cn: 我们有权为那件事奖励他.

sentences.en: Jenkins would reward all investors, no matter when they made their investment.
sentences.cn: 无论投资人何时投资，詹金斯都会让他们得到回报。

sentences.en: She wanted to reward the cleaners for their efforts.
sentences.cn: 她想酬谢清洁工们的努力。

sentences.en: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

sentences.en: The police are offering a big reward for information about the robbery.
sentences.cn: 警方出大笔赏金要求提供那起抢劫案的破案线索.

sentences.en: The reward has never been claimed.
sentences.cn: 从未有人来认领这笔赏金.

sentences.en: The reward money was apportioned among those who worked very hard.
sentences.cn: 奖金分给那些努力工作的人.

sentences.en: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.cn: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.en: The team have worked hard and their efforts have been rewarded with success.
sentences.cn: 球队很努力，他们的付出收获了成功。

words.tran_cn: 有益的，值得的；有报酬的，报答的

phrases.tran_cn: 作为…的报酬；作为…的回报

trans.tran_en: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked for it

trans.tran_cn: 报答， 酬谢， 奖励
trans.tran_en: to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked for it
